solution_line_template: She had {initial_bags} bags and restocked {restocked_bags} after selling some, so if she had not sold any, she would have a total of {initial_bags}+{restocked_bags} = <<{initial_bags}+{restocked_bags}={bags_if_not_sold}>>{bags_if_not_sold} bags
However she now has {current_bags} bags, so she must have sold off {bags_if_not_sold}-{current_bags} = <<{bags_if_not_sold}-{current_bags}={bags_sold}>>{bags_sold} bags
